Moscow (AP) -- Russia's defense ministry says the United States appears to be running a secret biological weapons laboratory in Georgia that allegedly violates international conventions and poses a direct security threat to Russia -- a charge the Pentagon angrily rejects. The special allegations from Moscow came on the same day that Us, British and Dutch officials accused Russian military intelligence of being behind multiple cyber attacks.
